entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update PackageValidation (APICompat) baseline version to 9.0.0 in November (.NET 9 GA) #106598
  • Timeout at System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits #106596
    10.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.ProcessStart_OnLinux_UsesSpecifiedProgram [FAIL] #106595
  • Remove dotnet9 feeds from NuGet.config when dependencies publish into dotnet10 feeds #106593
  • Cannot Bind a broadcastable socket on iOS 17 device #106588
  • Creating a System.Net.Sockets.Socket on iOS17 devices is not reliable and can crash the runtime #106587
  • Package readmes are broken #106585
    9.0.0
  • Zlib-ng compilation fails on Raspbian ARM32 system #106584
  • [API Proposal]: Structural Delegates #106582
    Future
  • NativeAOT and XmlSerializer #106580

Closed

  • Remove legacy support for MCG scenarios #37622
    10.0.0
  • SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test fails with timeout #106597
  • Exception at Microsoft.DotNet.RemoteExecutor.RemoteInvokeHandle.Dispose(Boolean disposing) #106486
  • [9.0] System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest #106493

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing exception log for ILogger extension methods #106600
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    needs-area-label
  • Remove the rest of the SimdAsHWIntrinsic support #106594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Fix condition for adding package readmes #106592
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix condition for adding package readmes #106590
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix zlib-ng compilation on Raspberry Pi ARM32 #106586
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Remove O(N) List<T>.RemoveAt from RegexCache.Add #106581
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Remove legacy APIs for MCG support #106568
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Bump downlevel to 8.0.8 #106548
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Fix build break in CrossAOT_Mono crossaot builds #106589
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Small tuning for write-barrier on arm64 #106191
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove some unused files and Crst levels #106583
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix build break in CrossAOT_Mono crossaot builds #106578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Move GetMethodTable to JIT #105098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106511
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Use ProjectReferences in inbox src projects #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-rc1] JIT: fix unused operand marking in LowerHWIntrinsicTernaryLogic #106574
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass structs containing empty struct arrays according to integer calling convention #106266
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Switch 8.0 build images to Azure Linux 3.0 #106170
    area-Infrastructure
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adjust the vector docs to use langword instead of cref to preserve generic type information where relevant #106561
    area-System.Numerics
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Blittable color #106575
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Migrating C++/CLI project throws compiler warning C4945 #31123
    Discussion
  • Razer escape @@ results in build error since SDK 8.0.400 #42730

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Fix the cppcli tests by upgrading to preview 7 in stage 0 #42823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the cppcli tests by upgrading to preview 7 in stage 0 #42822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update stage 0 to fix cppcli tests #42806
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable 9.0.1xx branch for SDKDiffTests and LicenseScanTest #42784
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Temporary fix for the cppcli tests #42811
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: endpoint, fortunes, updates #57395
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #57394
  • AddScheme() doesn't configure options #57393
  • CancellationToken property in ApiController model breaks model binding by default #57392
  • Make compiler error instead of runtime against using ChildContent #57391
  • OpenAPI: Range attribute causes FormatException #57390
  • Change request: Default Render mode #57396
  • Perf regression: plaintext #57389

Closed

  • Unexpected Syntax Error in blazor.web.js on iOS Versions Below 17 in .NET 9 Preview 7 #57326
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #57383
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #57388
  • Blazor - Authentication cookie in a webapi call in the same project #57367
  • Perf regression: json, mvc #57384

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Line break modes are not working on html text type #24298
  • El sdk microsoft.net.sdk especificado no se pudo encontrar #24297
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Keyboard events are not firing anymore #24295
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Debugger crashes the app on Windows almost immediately in debug configuration #24293

Closed

  • Make WebView available in ScrollView. #14349
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] DatePicker (Format='D') #24296
    community ✨
  • [Testing] moved FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight to appium #24294
    community ✨, testing-green-ci

Updated

  • Fixed FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24212
    community ✨
  • Add styling and Shell to Blazor Hybrid template #24253
    area-templates
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24160
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `WrapperView` #24281
    community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨
  • 899474: Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨
  • [IOS ]Fix border has an unexpected background animation #24227
    community ✨
  • Fix Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24156
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix SearchBar presentation taken whole screen size in horizontal screen orientation #24198
    community ✨
  • Defining CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the app #24205
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for CornerRadius of GradientDrawable for ImageButton #24200
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24209
    community ✨
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Fluent API: one-to-one relationship with 2 different syntax, only one is working #34459

Updated

  • Why is EF Core adding shadow fields on many to many join table queries? #34389
  • Create a docs link for Migrations locking #34428
    9.0.0
  • PendingMigrations: A command is already in progress #34456
  • EF should not produce differing newlines in SQL based on the OS it happens to run on #30775
    Backlog
  • Move method info lookups to shared internal classes #20631
    MQ
  • Configuring Primary Key as Descending Order #25111
    Backlog
  • Computed column incorrectly created as nullable #32451
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34460

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #34458

Updated

  • Added Support for translating Array.IndexOf methods for byte arrays for SqlServer & SQLite #34457
